item.title: FO - Product Page - Product Quickview - Add to cart
item.description: FO - Product Page - Product Quickview - Add to cart Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 1.7.8.x, 1.7.7.x, 8.0.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1248 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/functional/FO/classic/09_productPage/01_quickView/01_addToCart.ts Steps Step Description Expected result In FO, in quickview of a non custom product > Click on “Add to cart” You will see : * “Product successfully added to your shopping cart” message
